term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - comparative molecular field analysis (CoMFA)
term.title: comparative molecular field analysis

item.text: Comparative Molecular Field Analysis (CoMFA) is a 3D-QSAR method that uses statistical correlation techniques for the analysis of the quantitative relationship between the biological activity of a set of compounds with a special alignment, and their three-dimensional electronic and steric properties. Other properties, such as hydrophobicity and H-bonding, can also be incorporated into the analysis.
